MPUBLISH.summary: Posts multiple messages to a channel.
MPUBLISH.complexity: O(N+M+P) where N is the number of clients subscribed to the receiving channel, M is the total number of subscribed patterns (by any client) and P is the number of messages to be published.

reply_schema.description: The number of clients that received the message. Note that in a Cluster, only clients that are connected to the same node as the publishing client are included in the count.
